short_description: 【THE ULTIMATE FISHING TOY】Delight your kids with the QuadPro Fishing Game! This all-in-one package includes a rotating fish pond, 21 colorful fish and 4 fishing rods, all packed in a beautifully designed box - perfect as a gift.

【MULTI-SENSORY FUN】Experience limitless fun with our fishing game that features a rotating board with music-playing function and flashing LED lights. You can even turn off the music and still enjoy the game. Allowing up to 4 players, it's a fantastic way to bond with family and friends!

【SKILL BUILDING WITH JOY】Every catch counts in this magnetic fishing game as the fish randomly rise, open their mouths, move unpredictably and then quickly sink. This creates a thrilling and competitive atmosphere that engages the players' interest.

product_description: QuadPro Magnetic Fishing Game Set 🎣The QuadPro Magnetic Fishing Game is a smoothly designed and high-quality ABS toy set that features 21 colorfully detailed fish and 4 sturdy fishing rods. What sets this game apart is its unique rotating board. As you spin it, the fish randomly rise, opening their mouths, moving unpredictably and then quickly sink back down. It's a challenging and exciting twist to traditional fishing games, keeping kids engaged and entertained for hours. 🎣But we've taken it a step further. This game also includes an on-off music-playing function. The music and the flashing LED lights combine for a thrilling sensory experience that kids will absolutely love. If you prefer, you can turn off the music and still have loads of fun due to its magnetic features. 🎣Being suited for 4 players, it's a perfect way for the family to spend some quality time together, or for children to play with their friends. It's also a great tool to boost hand-eye coordination and basic math skills as children learn to count their catches. 🎣Despite its advanced features, it's straightforward to set up and operates on 3 x AA batteries (not included). It makes an ideal gift for birthdays, holidays or just as a delightful surprise. 🎣Imagine a cozy family game night, where everyone is engrossed in a lively fishing competition, the room pulsing with music and LED lights. The QuadPro Magnetic Fishing Game is perfect for such occasions. It's also great for play dates and children parties as it allows up to 4 players. 🎣Moreover, this game is an educational way to keep children occupied indoors during cold or rainy days. It's also a portable activity for picnics, beach outings, and camping trips. The magnetic play of fish and rod sparks creativity in young minds while sustaining their interest. With its fun game dynamics, QuadPro Magnetic Fishing Game promotes a joy for learning. It's a game where kids can just be kids - having fun while growing their skills.
